hudson.tasks.Shell.command: apt-get update apt-get install curl sudo -y curl -LO "https://dl.k8s.io/release/$(curl -L -s https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl" curl -LO "https://dl.k8s.io/$(curl -L -s https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl.sha256" echo "$(cat kubectl.sha256) kubectl" | sha256sum --check sudo install -o root -g root -m 0755 kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl cd /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/backup-pxc if ! kubectl delete -f backup.yaml -n pxc; then echo 'no old backup jobs present in cluster'; fi kubectl apply -f backup.yaml -n pxc
